name: Heisenberg Necklace (Breaking Bad Inspired)
description:
Another popular design request has been Breaking Bad inspired jewellery so here it is - a Heisenberg necklace!

Each hand illustrated Heisenberg pendant (approx 1") hangs on an 18" antique bronze tone chain with lobster clasp fastening.

Due to these pendants being illustrated each one will be completely unique! The perfect gift for any fan of Breaking Bad.

Although the charms have been glazed to protect the design please take care not to get them wet.

If sold out these can be made to order - email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries

name: Christmas Bunting Necklace
description:
These cute and festive necklaces are each made up of six small handmade flag charms!

Each flag has been drawn, coloured, cut to size and glazed to give a glossy finish which also preserves the design.

There are 5 different colour combinations available, with only 1 necklace of each design so every one is unique!

- plain red flags with red & green striped flags
- plain green flags with red & green striped flags
- plain red flags with gold & silver striped flags
- polka dot flags with gold & silver striped flags
- polka dot flags with red & green striped flags

The chains the flags hang on measure approx 18" and are silver toned.

If you would like to request a custom colour combination or design similar to this item please email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries.

name: Illustrated Owl Earrings
description:
These adorable hand illustrated owl earrings are a new addition here at Sawyer & Scout!

There are various colour combinations available (see photos for more detail).

Due to these pendants being hand illustrated and coloured each one will be completely unique!

Although the charms have been glazed to protect the design please take care not to get them wet.

If sold out these can be made to order. 
Or, if you would like to request a custom colour combination/earring wire colour email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries.

name: 75th Arena Necklace
description:
Here at Sawyer & Scout we're celebrating the release of Catching Fire with a design inspired by the 75th Hunger Games arena.

The necklace features a beautiful coloured glass bead, holding tiny seed beads inside, finished off with leaf bead caps and a leaf charm.

The pendant hangs on a 22" silver tone chain.


Please take extra care with this item as it is made of glass!

name: Hallows Necklace
description:
This simple necklace is inspired by the Harry Potter series.

A bronze tone charm - the Deathly Hallows symbol representing the stone, invisibility cloak and Elder wand - hangs on a matching tone 18" chain.

name: White Rabbit Earrings
description:
Hand illustrated studs are back! This design is inspired by Alice In Wonderland.

These cute little earrings feature a rabbit face design - each one individually hand drawn.

The earring posts are lead & nickel free and come with rubber backs. For pierced ears only.

Although the design has been sealed with a glaze please take care not to get the earrings wet as it may cause damage. These handmade earrings are very delicate so please take care when handling them.

Custom earring designs are available - please email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries

name: Divergent Inspired Faction Necklace
description:
These necklaces are inspired by the five factions in popular Veronica Roth's Divergent book series and upcoming film.

Each necklace has a charm featuring the name of the faction on one side and the word Divergent on the other. These are taken individually from pages of the book so each one is slightly different and therefore unique. 

There is also a charm & bead representing the faction symbol and colour. Together these hang on an antique bronze tone chain with lobster clasp fastening.

Dauntless: bullet charm & a black cube bead
Erudite: eye charm & a blue cube bead
Amity: tree charm & a red cube bead
Candor: scales charm & a golden yellow cube bead
Abnegation: a hand charm & clear cube bead 

Which faction would you choose?


Please take care not to get these necklaces wet as it may damage the paper in the charms.

If a particular faction is sold out please send an email to sawyerandscout@gmail.com to register your interest for when it is back in stock!

name: Mean Girls Inspired Quote Necklaces
description:
These necklaces are a new addition to our fiction collection, this time inspired by popular film Mean Girls.
 
There are two designs available the first features the quote 'That is so fetch' and the second 'On Wednesdays we wear pink'.

These handmade speech bubble pendants hang on 18" silver tone chains.

Perfect for any Mean Girls fan!


Please take care not to get these items wet as it may damage the design. 

These designs are hand drawn so can be made to order. If the item is showing as sold out please contact us to request one.
If you would like a different quote from Mean Girls or anywhere else please contact sawyerandscout@gmail.com to request a custom order!

name: Aztec Stud Earrings
description:
These striking earrings have been hand drawn and coloured with an Aztec style print. Now available in three colour options!

The earrings measure approx 10mm across and have been glazed to protect the design. Please take care not to get the earrings wet as it may damage them. These handmade earrings are very delicate so please take care when handling them.

The earring posts are lead & nickel free. For pierced ears only.

Custom colours/designs are also available. Please send any enquiries to sawyerandscout@gmail.com

name: Lovebirds Bracelet
description:
This pretty little bracelet design features a pattern of tiny birds and hearts.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a bronze tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

Avialable in two colours - white (with blue and dark pink detailing) or pink (with white and dark pink detailing)

name: Platform 9 3/4 Necklace
description:
The newest design in our popular Harry Potter inspired range is this cute handwritten Platform 9 3/4 sign!

Each black plastic pendant is handmade and measures approx. 1.5" long.
Available on either a silver or bronze tone chain - approx. 18"

As each charm is handmade they are all completely unique!

name: TARDIS Necklace (Inspired by Doctor Who)
description:
You requested Doctor Who inspired jewellery so here it is! The TARDIS necklace features a hand drawn and coloured illustration of the famous Police Box.

Each small TARDIS pendant (approx 1") hangs on an 18" antique bronze tone chain with lobster clasp fastening.

Due to these pendants being illustrated each one will be completely unique! 

Although the charms have been glazed to protect the design please take care not to get them wet.

If sold out these can be made to order - email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries

name: Mini Potions Necklace
description:
These cute necklaces are each inspired by different potions from the world of Harry Potter, the perfect gift for any Potter fan!

Each miniature 1" tall glass bottle is filled with glitter & beads and finished off with a hand drawn name tag. The pendants are fixed onto a delicate 18" silver coloured chain.

Options available are:
Polyjuice/Blue - the famous transformation potion
Veritaserum/Green - a powerful truth serum
Elixir of Life/Silver - makes the drinker immortal
Amortentia/Red - the most powerful known love potion
Felix Felicis/Gold - also known as liquid luck!
Sleeping Draught/Purple - sends the drinker into a deep sleep

Please note: The bottles are sealed and cannot be opened and as they are made of glass care should be taken when handling them. The contents of each bottle will differ slightly as each one is individually filled.

Please take a look at my other Harry Potter inspired items!

name: Dinosaur Bracelet
description:
Jurassic park fan or not you can't deny how cute these little dinosaurs are!

The bracelets are made of waxed cord in either blue or purple and finished with brass tone findings. Alongisde the dinosaur there is also a sparkly blue bead.

The bracelets measure approx. 17cm however an extender can be added or a slightly shorter length can be made on request.

name: Changing Of The Guard Bracelet
description:
One of our new pretty ribbon bracelets - this patriotic design with tiny soldier print would make a great addition to any collection.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a silver tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

name: Mini Golden Snitch Necklace
description:
Our original Golden Snitch Necklace is one of our most popular items here at Sawyer & Scout. We've decided that our Harry Potter inspired collection needs a miniature version of the Golden Snitch - so here it is!

This Snitch is made up of a beautiful gold coloured filigree bead and two tiny silver wing charms. The completed pendant hangs on an 18" silver coloured chain.

Perfect for those Harry Potter fans who like a more subtle and delicate piece of jewellery!

name: Little Red Owl Bracelet
description:
This cute red owl design makes the perfect bracelet for Autumn.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a silver tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

name: Bunny Charm Bracelet
description:
This classic bracelet design features an adorable bunny charm paired with a round pink bead.

The bracelet chain is a bronze tone and is adjustable between approx. 
7-9" so will fit most people.

name: Finnick Charm Necklace
description:
Part of our Hunger Games inspired collection is this necklace inspired by the popular character Finnick Odair.

Finnick is a victor from District 4 (fishing) and enters the Quarter Quell arena in the second Hunger Games book Catching Fire. 

The necklace is based around a beautiful sea-themed glass bead which also has tiny turquoise beads inside. Each glass bead is completely individual but has a mixture of blues, green, white, purple. and yellow. Along with the main bead there is a tiny pearl bead, beautiful shell-like bead caps and three other silver charms. The fork/trident represents the weapon used by Finnick to win the 65th games. The other charms, a tiny number 4 and a shell, represent Finnick's district.

The pendant hangs on a 22" chain.

As this is a glass bead necklace it will be packaged in a small gift box and shipped 2nd class. Postage is included in the UK price.

Take a look at our other Hunger Games inspired items!

name: Tris Charm Necklace
description:
The newest addition to our growing Divergent inspired range is this charm necklace inspired by main character Tris.

The necklace comes with both a bullet charm and a hand charm to represent the two factions Tris has belonged to. Alongside these are two real gemstones - one black and one clear - and a circular charm with a black bird design.

The charms hang on a bronze tone chain which measures approx. 18"

name: Bertie Botts Necklace
description:
Updated design - now on bronze tone chains too!

This fun design is inspired by the famous 'Bertie Botts Every Flavour Beans' from the Harry Potter series!

Each miniature glass bottle is filled with a variety of different beads and comes complete with a hand-drawn 'Bertie Botts' tag. 

The bottle charm is approximately 1" and hangs on an 18" chain in either a bronze or silver tone. 

Due to the nature of the product each one will differ slightly in the contents of the bottle and the hand-drawn tags. Colour of cord around the bottle neck is black on bronze chain or brown on silver chain.

The bottles are made of glass and are therefore delicate and must be handled with care and may be damaged by water. They are also sealed and cannot be opened.

Please take a look at my other Harry Potter inspired products!

name: Dexter Inspired Bottled Blood Slides
description:
Here at Sawyer & Scout we're big fans of Dexter so we've created a necklace design for fellow fans!

Each necklace features a small glass bottle pendant filled with 5 handmade & completely unique blood slides including one smiley face slide just like in the first season of the show!

The bottle pendant hangs on an 18" bronze tone chain with lobster clasp fastening.

Due to the individually handmade slides each necklace is a complete one of a kind unique!

The cork is sealed so the bottle cannot be opened. 
Please take care not to get the pendant wet as this may cause damage.

name: Cluedo Notebooks
description:
These cute mini notebooks have been created using real Cluedo cards!

Each notebook contains approx. 20 double-sided blank white pages perfect for note taking and doodling on the go!

On the front of each notebook there is a character card and on the back either a weapon or room. The reverse side of the cards has the classic Cluedo logo in black and white.

Please note - since these are made from recycled games the cards may have some slight imperfections.

name: Harry Potter Inspired Cluster Charm Necklace
description:
This cluster charm necklace is perfect for Harry Potter fans!

The necklace includes
- a large gold coloured lightning bolt charm
- a bronze coloured wand charm
- a mini snitch made from a bronze filigree bead and silver wings
- a clear bead with gold and red stripes representing Gryffindor
- a dark red faceted bead representing the Philosopher's Stone

These all hang on an 18" bronze coloured chain.

Take a look at our Harry Potter inspired collection!

name: District 4 Necklace
description:
This necklace design is from our collection inspired by The Hunger Games and was created to go alongside our District 11 & 12 designs.

As 4 is the fishing district the miniature bottle is filled with sand, crushed shells and a pearl bead. Also attached to the necklace is a small silver disc handstamped with the number 4.
The chain is approx. 22"

Please note: care must be taken as the bottle is made from glass. It is also sealed shut and cannot be opened - the seal may be damaged by water so please take care.

District 11 & 12 Necklaces also available!

name: Golden Snitch Necklace
description:
Another necklace inspired by the popular Harry Potter series!

This cute little golden snitch necklace is made up of a spherical locket & two small wings. The completed pendant hangs on an 18" chain, all in a brass/antique gold colour. 

Approx. measurements: pendant 1.5cm, wings 3cm.

The colour inside the locket may vary from the photographs as it can differ slightly between the locket charms.

Please take a look at our other Harry Potter inspired items.

name: Gemstone Duo Necklace
description:
This particular design is made using real gemstones and there are four colour options available:

(From L-R in first photo)
- Golden Quartz & Blue Gold
- Aventurine & Pale Jade
- Amethyst & Rose Quartz
- Unakite

The gemstone duos each hang on a delicate 18" silver coloured chain and each necklace is completely individual!

name: 'Nightlock' Necklace
description:
The Nightlock Necklace is the first miniature bottle design in our Hunger Games inspired collection. The perfect gift for a Hunger Games fan!

The bottle is filled with dark purple beads which represent the famous Nightlock berries from the first arena which ended up changing Panem forever. There is also a bronze-tone arrow charm representing Katniss' favourite weapon fixed alongside it. These both hang on an 18" bronze coloured chain.

Please note: The bottle is secured shut and cannot be opened.
Colour of beads may vary slightly.

Don't forget to take a look at the rest of our Hunger Games inspired designs.

name: Summer Bunting Necklace
description:
This cute necklace is made up of six small handmade flag charms! 

Each flag has been drawn, coloured, cut to size and glazed to give a glossy finish which also preserves the design.

Now available in two colour themes:
- pink/purple/orange
- blue/green/purple
both perfect for the Summer months!

The necklace measures approx 18"

If you would like to request a custom colour combination or design similar to this item please email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries.

name: Reaping Ball Necklace
description: This necklace is from our Hunger Games inspired collection and is inspired by the Reaping where the tributes are chosen. The necklace features tiny slips of paper with the names of four famous characters from District 12; Katniss Everdeen, Primrose Everdeen, Peeta Mellark & Gale Hawthorne. These are held inside a delicate round glass bead handmade in Canada. The design is finished off with pretty silver bead caps and small black beads to represent the coal of District 12's trade. The completed pendant hangs on a 22" chain. As well as this 'standard' design there is a customised option available so you can add names of your other favourite characters or even add yourself and your friends into the mix! If you would like to order a customised option you will need to email us as soon as possible after placing your order with the names you would like to be included - sawyerandscout@gmail.com Please note that custom orders will take extra time to complete. All of our glass bead items come packaged in a small gift box (2nd class delivery (included in the UK price) to ensure they arrive with you safely. **VERY LIMITED NUMBER AVAILABLE**

name: Tris' Tattoo Necklace
description:
This design was inspired by popular book Divergent and it's main character Tris who has a tattoo of three birds to represent the members of her family.

We have used these beautiful bronze tone birds to recreate the tattoo design from the books. In between the birds there are small black sparkling beads which represent the colour worn by the Dauntless faction.

Necklace measures appox. 18"

The perfect gift for fans of Divergent!

name: Russian Doll Bracelet
description:
One of our newest bracelet designs features these pretty little red russian dolls - perfect for Christmas!

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a silver tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

name: 'Vervain' Locket Necklace
description:
This design is inspired by the necklace worn by Elena in The Vampire Diaries television series.

The brass coloured pendant is also a locket with a magnetic fastening which can be opened at the back (see additional images). It also features a red gemstone on the front. The pendant hangs on an 18" brass tone chain.

Perfect for fans of The Vampire Diaries!

name: Lord Of The Rings Notebooks
description:
These cute mini notebooks have been created using cards from the Lord Of The Rings Trivial Pursuit DVD game!

Each notebook contains approx. 25 double-sided blank white pages perfect for note taking and doodling on the go!

On each of the card covers there are six trivia questions with the answers printed on the reverse side.

Great for any Lord Of The Rings fan!

Please note - since these are made from recycled games the cards may have some slight imperfections.

categories.name: Notebooks & Journals - Lord Of The Rings

name: Hello Kitty Bracelet
description:
A cute new addition to our fiction inspired collections are these Hello Kitty ribbon bracelets.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a silver tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

Available in two colours - bright lilac or pastel pink.

name: District 12 Cluster Necklace
description:
The District 12 Cluster Necklace is part of our collection inspired by The Hunger Games.

The necklace is made up of a bronze tone arrow/circle charm, bronze tone number charms, a large pearl bead and a small coal-like black faceted bead. The bronze tone chain measures approx 18" and has a lobster clasp fastening.

Take a look at the rest of our collection which includes another District 12 Necklace design!

name: Patchwork Hearts Bracelet
description:
One of our new pretty ribbon bracelets - this pastel design with purple and pink hearts would make a cute addition to any collection.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a bronze tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

name: Tick Tock Necklace (Version 2)
description:
This eyecatching necklace features a miniature bottle filled with clear beads, sequins and real tiny watch parts!

The idea for the design came from the arena in Catching Fire, the second book in the Hunger Games trilogy.

Each pendant is completely unique due to the watch parts used.

The pendant hangs on an 18" silver coloured chain.

Please note: care must be taken with this item as it is made of glass, the bottle is sealed shut.

name: Gemstone Friendship Bracelet Sets
description:
Set of two adjustable brown cord bracelets with real gemstones. 

Each set has either:
one Golden Quartz stone & one Turquoise stone
or one Amethyst & one Rose Quartz stone.

Please note: as they are natural gemstones the size and shape of the chips will differ in each set. See additional photographs for examples.

name: Playing Card Notebooks
description:
These cute mini notebooks have been created using real playing cards!

Each notebook contains approx. 20 double-sided blank white pages perfect for note taking and doodling on the go!

There are two design options available - the 'picture card' option has a picture card front cover (King, Queen or Jack) and a patterned card on the back. The 'pattern cover' option has the patterned side of the cards on the outside of the notebooks with the number/suit on the inside covers.

name: Night Sky Necklace
description:
This beautiful pendant with it's pearly shimmering specks reminds us of a starry night sky!

The bead hangs on a 22" silver tone chain and is the perfect simple statement necklace that works with any outfit.

The best part about these beads is that each one is completely individual.

Limited edition piece!

name: 'Neville's Remembrall' Necklace
description:
Part of our Harry Potter inspired collection is this Remembrall Necklace based on the remembrall owned by popular character Neville.

In the Philosopher's Stone Neville is sent a Remembrall by his grandmother to help him remember things. The smoke in the clear glass ball is supposed to turn red to remind him but the trouble is Neville still can't remember what it is hes forgotten! The Remberall was also the reason Harry Potter became Gryffindor's youngest seeker!

The necklace is made from a beautiful hand blown glass bead sourced all the way from Canada. The bead is clear with swirling stripes of orange and brown and the pendant is finished off with lovely leaf design silver bead caps. The pendant hangs on an 18" chain.

As this is a glass bead necklace it will come packaged in a small gift box to ensure it arrives safely. Please note - all of our gift boxed items are posted 2nd class to keep the cost down for you.

name: 'Coraline' Cluster Charm Necklace
description:
This striking necklace design is inspired by the popular Neil Gaiman book Coraline which was also adapted into a successful stop-motion animation film in 2009.

The necklace is made up in a cluster style with a collection of small charms inspired by the story. 

The charms included are: 
- a black button to represent the button eyes
- a skeleton hand just like the evil other mother has
- a miniature key like the one that opens the door to the other world
- a small gemstone to represent the stone Coraline uses in the game
- a blue bead which matches Coraline's hair in the 2009 movie

These all hang on a 22" chain.

name: District 11 Necklace
description:
This necklace design is part of our collection inspired by The Hunger Games. In the book tributes Rue & Thresh were from District 11.

As District 11 is the agricultural district the miniature bottle is filled with real moss. Also attached to the necklace is a small silver disc handstamped with the number 11.

The chain itself is approx. 22"

Please note: care must be taken as the bottle is made from glass. It is also sealed shut and cannot be opened.

District 12 Necklace also available!

name: Pastel Stripes Bunting Necklace
description:
This cute necklace is made up of six small handmade flag charms!

Each flag has been drawn, coloured, cut to size and varnished to give a glossy finish which also preserves the design.

The Pastel Stripe version includes lilac, beige, green, peach, yellow and blue striped flags all hanging on a silver tone chain (approx 18")

Please take care not to get the flag charms wet as it may damage them.

If you would like to request a custom colour combination or design similar to this item please email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries.

name: Message In A Bottle Necklace
description:
This small brown glass bottle has a tiny message inside!

The cute miniature bottle hangs on an 18" antique gold coloured chain. It has a tiny scroll of paper tucked inside which is held together with a small piece of brass wire. The bottle is topped off with a real cork and sealed shut.

Please note care must be taken with this item as it is made of glass, and exposure to water could could damage to the cork.

name: Bright Bunting Necklace
description:
This cute necklace is made up of six small handmade flag charms! 

Each flag has been coloured, cut to size and glazed to give a glossy finish which also preserves the design. These hang on a silver tone chain (approx 18")

If you would like to request a custom colour combination or design similar to this item please email sawyerandscout@gmail.com for enquiries.

name: Gemstone Bar Necklace
description:
This simple but striking design is made using tiny Tourmaline gemstones which have a range of beautiful colours inlcuding purple, pink, green, grey and beige. 

The bar of gemstones hangs on a delicate 18" silver coloured chain and each necklace is completely individual!

name: District 12 Necklace
description:
This necklace design is one of our favourites from our collection inspired by The Hunger Games.

As 12 is the coal mining district the miniature bottle is filled with tiny black stones which represent the coal. Also attached to the necklace is a small silver disc handstamped with the number 12.
The chain itself is approx. 22"

Please note: care must be taken as the bottle is made from glass. It is also sealed shut and cannot be opened.

name: Bright Floral Bracelet
description:
These beautiful ribbon bracelets feature a bright floral pattern in red, pink, green and yellow.

The ribbon section of the bracelet measures approx. 6" and is finished off with a bronze tone clasp. The bracelet also has an extender so the length can be adjusted between approx. 7-9" and will therefore fit most people.

name: Arrow & Pearl Earrings
description:
These earrings are inspired by Katniss Everdeen the central character from the Hunger Games series.

Each earring has two pearl beads and a bronze coloured arrow charm. These hang on bronze coloured ear wires (suitable for pierced ears only).

Take a look at the rest of our Hunger Games inspired collection!

name: Bottled Turquoise Necklace
description:
This new necklace design features a miniature clear glass bottle filled with real pieces of turquoise gemstone.

The pendant hangs on a 22" silver tone chain.

Please note the bottled is sealed shut.

name: Katniss Necklace
description:
This eyecatching necklace design was inspired by The Hunger Games main character Katniss Everdeen.

The bow and arrow charm has handpainted red detailing and is paired with a small pearl bead. These hang on a silver coloured chain which measures approx. 22".

The perfect gift for any Hunger Games fan!

Earrings also available.

name: Katniss Earrings
description:
This earring design was inspired by The Hunger Games main character Katniss Everdeen.

The bow and arrow charms have handpainted red detailing and are each paired with a small pearl bead. They hang on silver coloured lead & nickel free earring wires (pierced ears only).

The perfect gift for any Hunger Games fan!

Also available: Katniss Necklace

name: Johanna Charm Necklace
description:
Part of our Hunger Games inspired collection is this necklace representing the popular tribute Johanna Mason.

Johanna is a victor from District 7 (lumber) and enters the Quarter Quell arena in the second Hunger Games book Catching Fire.

The necklace has three charms - a silver tone axe, a tiny number 7 and a beautiful glass leaf. The axe represents the weapon used by Johanna in the arena, whilst the 7 and leaf represent her district. 

The pendant hangs on a 22" chain silver tone.

Don't forget to take a look at our other Hunger Games inspired items!

name: Gift Box
description:
Buying something as a gift? 

We now offer the option of adding a gift box to your order!

The brightly coloured gift boxes are hand stamped with the shop name and the colour of the gift box will be chosen at random. Please note: only one item per gift box.

Just add a gift box to your shopping cart with your order and we will package it up for you!

If you are ordering more than one item please send an email to let us know which one you would like gift wrapped.

Please note our glass bead products all include gift boxing in the prices to ensure they arrive safely. 

Orders with gift boxes are posted out 2nd class as standard however if you would like your order to be posted out 1st class at an additional cost please contact us before purchasing - sawyerandscout@gmail.com
